name: Circle of the Sea
description: Druids who channel the power of the ocean, commanding water and aquatic life.

2.Wrath of the Sea: As a Bonus Action, you can expend a use of Wild Shape to manifest a watery aura for 10 minutes. While active, you gain Swimming Speed equal to Walking Speed, can breathe underwater, gain Temporary HP equal to your Druid level, and once per turn when you deal Cold, Lightning, or Thunder damage, add extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Circle Spells.description: You always have certain spells prepared.

6.Aquatic Affinity: You gain proficiency in Vehicles (Water) if you don't have it. You can communicate simple ideas with Beasts with swimming speeds. Creatures with swimming speeds have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

10.Oceanic Gift: You gain Resistance to Cold and Lightning damage. You gain Swimming Speed equal to Walking Speed and can breathe underwater.

14.Tidal Surge: As an action, you can create a massive wave. Each creature you choose within 120 feet must succeed on a Strength save or take 6d10 Bludgeoning damage and be pushed up to 30 feet away and knocked Prone. On success, half damage and not pushed or knocked Prone. Once used, can't use again until Long Rest.
